prompts: Create a Pokemon that can change its type based on its environment.
Imagine a creature that has both bipedal and quadruped traits for versatility.
Design a legendary Pokemon that embodies the powers of all types.
Generate a mythical being that has a sleek, armored body and sharp features.
Show me a Pokemon that can adapt its appearance based on its surroundings.
Make a unique Pokemon that combines elements of different types into one form.
I want a creature that has a beautiful white fur and a fierce demeanor.
